item.title: RSS Is Based
item.description: I recently started using Newsboat for RSS. Getting a proper RSS setup has been on my “cozy setup” checklist for a while. It didn’t take much time at all to get it working either. I previously just used browser plug-ins for this however this approach is terrible in practice. Now that I have a proper setup using Newsboat I can truly appreciate RSS feeds and I would recommend using them to anyone that wants to keep up to date with things without engaging with social media.
